itemInfo.itemDesc: A tool that can reconstruct the substance.\n- It can be installed in a residence.\n- Additional effects applied later

item.name: Polished Stone
item.desc: A Crude Stone used as material for Crafting.\n\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Grinding Rough Stones.

item.name: Usable Scantling
item.desc: Timber required for Construction.\n\n- How to Obtain: It can be also be obtained by Chopping Logs received from trees Lumbered in any region.

item.name: Melted Iron Shard
item.desc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Heating Iron Ore.

item.name: Black Stone Powder
item.desc: A basic ingredient used in Crafting.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained at a Refinery through Crafting.
